original_text: Simon Peter was still standing there by the fire to make himself warm. The other people there said to him, ‘You must also be one of that man's disciples.’ But Peter said, ‘No, I am not.’
korean_text: 시몬 베드로가 서서 불을 쬐더니 사람들이 묻되 너도 그 제자 중 하나가 아니냐 베드로가 부인하여 이르되 나는 아니라 하니

sentences.original_text: Simon Peter was still standing there by the fire
sentences.korean_translation: 시몬 베드로는 여전히 불 곁에 서 있었다

sentences.original_text: The other people there said to him
'You must also be one of that man's disciples'
sentences.korean_translation: '당신도 그 사람의 제자 중 한 사람이어야만 합니다'
